By Bladerunner on Sunday, October 13, 2002 - 08:17 am:

I'm starting an entry now, might take a week to do. I don't understand the calculated speed of 1 though. Exactly how does form affect speed?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, October 13, 2002 - 12:19 pm:

Someone else if going to have to provide the exact numbers here, I just know the general effects. Fat means your monster is slower to dodge, but takes less damage if hit. Skinny means your monster can dodoge better, but gets hurt more when hit. Each level of weight has its own numerical value, effecting the speed stat.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, October 13, 2002 - 03:04 pm:

If you make your monster normal, and the speed at level 1 (49 points or less), you will be fine.
